turns.content: write replay for this email: I need five days’ leave due to my surgery at a local hospital. Therefore, I request you to please accept my leaves and grant leaves from (6th-March-2023 to 10th-March-2023) to recover my health speedily. I will be thankful to you.

Dear [Name],

Thank you for letting me know about your upcoming surgery at a local hospital. I am sorry to hear that you will need to take some time off to recover, but I understand that your health must come first.

I have reviewed your leave request, and I am pleased to inform you that it has been approved. You are granted leave from March 6th, 2023 to March 10th, 2023. During this time, please focus on your recovery and take care of yourself.

If you require any further assistance or support during this period, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I wish you a speedy recovery and look forward to your return to work.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
